body:
The timeline for Verrazzano releases and the date of their end of error correction.
   Verrazzano Release Date Latest Patch Release Latest Patch Release Date End of Error Correction     1.6 2023-06-28 1.6.2 2023-07-24 2024-06-30*   1.5 2023-02-15 1.5.5 2023-08-02 2024-02-28   1.4 2022-09-30 1.4.6 2023-07-31 2023-10-31   1.3 2022-05-24 1.3.8 2022-11-17 2023-05-31   1.2 2022-03-14 1.2.2 2022-05-10 2022-11-30   1.1 2021-12-16 1.1.2 2022-03-09 2022-09-30   1.0 2021-08-02 1.0.4 2021-12-20 2022-06-30    *Projected date. Actual date will be determined when the next minor or major release is available.
